name: Adolf Hitler
fact: Chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and FÃ¼hrer of Nazi Germany from 1934 to 1945.

name: Joseph Stalin
fact: General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1922 to 1953 and Leader of the Soviet Union from 1924 to 1953.

name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
fact: 32nd President of the United States from 1933 to 1945, leading the country through the Great Depression and World War II.

name: Winston Churchill
fact: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom during World War II, serving two terms. He is often referred to as the 'Greatest Briton' of the 20th century.

name: Hideki Tojo
fact: Prime Minister of Japan during World War II, responsible for the attack on Pearl Harbor and the Pacific Theater.

name: Benito Mussolini
fact: Dictator of Italy from 1922 to 1943, leading the country into World War II on the side of the Axis powers.
